body: Man Oda could've made carrot a 20 yo shortstack but instead he drew her like every other sexy girl in the series and is 15 apparently for some reason

Nigga I fuck agree wit u man like I'm not gay or some shit but like they always have robin or nami fuck other people like WTF bro we wanna see them get fuck the crew not some random people. Also everytime I read a robin or nami, them drawings don't even look like them; Some of the Yaoi yes FUCKING YAOI r better than these like bro step up ur games people

For fucks sake how hard would it of been for the author to have one of the one piece crew like luffy sanji or zoro fuck them instead of some random shits. why are one piece hentai always like this. they couldn't even draw carrot right and no matter what h-manga artist makes it they always seem to make nami and Robin look like whore cum dumpsters and ya know what really pisses me of? Most of the naruto parodies on here are good, so why are all the one piece one's always so shit!? i mean they're both big name anime/manga  with billions of fans so why is there such a huge quality difference in the hentai quality between the two? Literally the only good one piece hentai I've ever found was yaoi, FUCKING YAOI MAN.

They mess up Carrot design, she should have fur. Also, the story is boring 
I would give this a 4/10
Why is it always these no face random fucks in One Piece hentai? There's legit actual characters you can use instead.
I could go for some Pale Carrot Cake. <3
I am not really a furry, but Carrot just looks jarring without it.
